verse.gurmukhi: iqAwg kir kY kpt kau icq lwie kIjY syv ]

transliteration.english: reejh hai gurdhev tau tum pai ho bar dhaan ||
transliteration.hindi: रीझ है गुरदेव तउ तुम पाइ हो बरु दान ॥

verse.gurmukhi: XO n hoie auDwr pY suin lyhu dq sujwn ]112]
verse.unicode: ਯੌ ਨ ਹੋਇ ਉਧਾਰ ਪੈ ਸੁਨਿ ਲੇਹੁ ਦਤ ਸੁਜਾਨ ॥੧੧੨॥

en.bdb: When the Guru is pleased, he will grant you a boon, otherwise O wise an sagacious Dutt! you will not be able to achieve redemption.”112.

bdb.gurmukhi: hy sujwn d`q! sux lY ik ies qrRhw au`Dwr nhIN hoxw ]112]
